ygData.subject: Re: Places to get the heck out of 35?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, I think I will try SolB again. The problem with L Guk is getting there. Trying to get through Upper Guk is a real Pain in the potooty. The specs in
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks,

I think I will try SolB again. The problem with L Guk is getting there.
Trying to get through Upper Guk is a real Pain in the potooty.

The specs in Feerrot are likely not soloable at 35 eh?


----- Original Message -----
From: Mikaela Valorblade <mikaela@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 5:01 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Places to get the heck out of 35?


> From: "Mikaela Valorblade" <mikaela@...>
>
> Go to SolB or the bedroom/Savant's room in Lguk. Another place is the
upper
> throne room in Cazic, but SolB and Lguk prolly better exp and less trains
> and stupid people.
>
> Mik
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Martyn Adams" <martyn-adams@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 3:47 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Places to get the heck out of 35?
>
>
> > From: Martyn Adams <martyn-adams@...>
> >
> >
> >
> > David Bradshaw wrote:
> > >
> > > From: "David Bradshaw" <Logain@...>
> > >
> > > I have been stuck on level 35 for years now... (ok a slight
> exageration..)
> > > Someone told me that the specs in Feerrot was a good spot to get out
of
> this
> > > level... I just spent 4 hours in Kith with a group and only got 25% of
a
> > > bbl. We where fighting many different things including reds...
> > >
> > > A few ppl in my group told me they ended up having to solo to get out
of
> > > this level with any type of speed...
> > >
> > > Any insight would be appreciated.
> >
> > I took a good while to get out of 35, I did it hunting in groups in Sol
> > B, Kings room if I managed to get into the group there (which being a
> > cleric wasn't actually that hard.. our server works on a waiting list..
> > however it seems to have two sections.. clerics and others.. :)
> >
> > Okay your going to be grouping with lvl 35-50's.. but you can get
> > through a lot of Kobolds in that time and you have a good chance of
> > picking up a pair of Runed Mithril Bracers (+5 wis +3 str AC 4). Which
> > is nice.. :)
> >
> > > Thump Ghoulsbane
> > > 35th Cleric of the Underfoot
> > >
> >
> > Vinamin L'Crit
> > Lvl 36 DE Cleric
> > Erollisi Marr
> >
